subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: For the German team at the World Cup, Thomas Müller, once again its leading scorer, is an unusually versatile forward. Manuel Neuer is an unusually versatile goalkeeper.
snippet: For the German team at the World Cup, Thomas Müller, once again its leading scorer, is an unusually versatile forward. Manuel Neuer is an unusually versatile goalkeeper.
